title: Freelance Consultant - Data Analysis
keyPoints: Built a data ingestion pipeline involving complex SQL nested merges on non-matching time-stamps
Made heavy use of plotting, to visualize noisy sensor data, to give find development
Removed thousands of duplicates from Acumatica CRM database, used backend API to create views for dashboards
Performs well working independently under stress, without clear directions by evaluating different approaches and committing.

title: UnpackAI - Technical Product Manager & Course Creator
keyPoints: Trained and empowered 6 instructors to teach courses inspired by FastAI
Designed, maintained, and taught open source courses to cohorts of diverse learners
Helped students create PoC by applying AI to diverse fields from chemistry, to manufacturing and medical imaging
Thrived in communicating complex concepts to non-technical team members, and the public through workshops

title: Troublemaker - Active Member
keyPoints: Prototyped constrained ag-tech IoT devices with Arduino, Micropython and other C++ IoT Frameworks
Received mentorship in a hardware incubator environment from Pietro Minicuzzi and Hans Michl
Sourced electronic components in Chinese, with due diligence and practical IP protection skills
Built an automated rooftop greenhouse, with irrigation and light control systems, and sensors logged to PSQL
